Yuri Alekseyevich Gagarin was a Russian Soviet pilot and cosmonaut. He was 
the first human to journey into outer space, when his Vostok spacecraft 
completed an orbit of the Earth on 12 April 1961. Gagarin became an 
international celebrity, and was awarded many medals and titles, including Hero 
of the Soviet Union, the ... The Yuri Gagarin Medal is awarded in his honor.
